title: Preferences explanation
content: I would like to know if the preferences (found in about:config or prefs.js) are explained in detail somewhere For example, what is browser.safebrowsing.provider.google.advisoryURL? What values can it have? Why can't preference entries be deleted (not just given a value of "") by the user? Thank you.
creator: lucchesi.esteban

title: A nova versão do Firefox não abre arquivo html
content:
Cenário:

Primeiro você abre o Firefox normalmente e depois abre com o botão direito do mouse algum arquivo html salvo no seu computador.


$ firefox -v Mozilla Firefox 96.0.2
creator: fernandojs2011

title: What do I need to do to play my DVD & display on my computer. I used to play CDs once in a while, but have not been doing anthing like this in a long time & have forgotten. please help I want to see my deceased husbands medical studies.
content: I need to know what to do to get my DVD to play.
creator: dorothyh998

title: Firefox settings for tracking turned on for Domain incoming.telemetry.mozilla.org but does not stop the tracking.
content: I use Mint 19.3 and is attached to a hardware product Winston Privacy which due to lack of sales the piece of Hardware is no longer available but the Hardware I have has a Lifetime License in the firmware. My point is the tracking that Mozilla does seems to be very high with Mozilla even though I have turned off the tracking with Firefox. As you can see with the attached file 'ScreenShot1' Pie graph Domain 'incoming.telemetry.mozilla.org' is the majority of the pie which has a count of 61 blocks. File 'ScreenShot2' shows the actual number count for the Domain.
creator: tsin4

title: "Hmm. We’re having trouble finding that site." since Firefox 96
content: Ever since I updated to Firefox 96, I have been receiving the error message "Hmm. We’re having trouble finding that site." at times. Refreshing does help. This did not seem to happen with Firefox 95. I am currently on Firefox 96.0.2. I tried restarting the computer, tried refreshing Firefox, tried disabling hardware acceleration, etc., and the issue still persists.
creator: sabbath99

title: Firefox Bookmarks
content: I use serveral browsers during the week, but Mozilla Firefox is my primary browser. I use to have hundreds of bookmarks in my Firefox Bookmarks, but now I have none. Where did they go and how to I recover them?
creator: donnahoo
